meanings.definition: A shortened form of the word 'carabiner', a metal loop with a spring-loaded gate used to quickly and reversibly connect components.
meanings.sent1: I attached my keys to the biner on my backpack.
meanings.sent2: The climber secured the rope with a sturdy biner.
meanings.sent3: The biner decided to take a break and hang out on the backpack.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a biner, connecting everyone in joy.
meanings.sent5: The shiny biner clicked open, ready for the next adventure.
